website_summaries.verdict: A basic twin bed frame that comes at a price that won't break your budget.
pros: No need for a box spring
Conveniently provides up to 13 inches of storage space underneath
cons: Some complaints that the frame isn't especially sturdy

customer_reviews.title: son and am happy to report that it appears to support him very ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this frame for my 6'5" 260 lbs. son and am happy to report that it appears to support him very well. When shopping, I was looking for a frame with a superior supporting system as the "typical" frame was inadequate. He is a teenager and does not treat much of my furniture gently! I would definitely recommend this product for any individual requiring a frame under similar circumstances. Set up was easy with pictures to assist and I actually did it myself, which is not the way it normally happens as my husband usually does this kind of thing. It's only been a few weeks since set up but nothing appears to have "loosened".
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: It's actually a fine value.
customer_reviews.text: I would normally prefer a regular mattress foundation as it's easier to make the bed, but for a guest room this is fine. I put an anti-skid rug rubberized pad between mattress and this frame. It's not so much that the mattress slides it's that it's a bit more challenging to make the bed with the wires. That could be solved with some kind of a piece of ply or something else or simply the under pad for a rug. I do like the height as it allows for plenty storage under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: French Roast

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY AND SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd different style of bed frame I have ordered and assembled. This one is pretty sturdy and has a lot of support, but way harder to put together then the other two. But it does appear to have a lot more support. Would recommend, takes about 10 minutes or less to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: RCA (USA)

customer_reviews.title: You'll be needing assistance if you'll put an area rug underneath 😁
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy although not that easy to put up but it's worth every penny i paid for..i love it. It needs a little common sense so you won't damage your floor.I have my BF cut pieces of wood blocks for the legs..Not squeaky ,no missing pieces ,no bend corners upon delivery..I love it.now i can put alot of stuff at the bottom..i really need that EXTRA EXTRA room since my apt.is small.I recommend this bed 5 star 😄
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very great product and easy to assemble. Seems quite hefty and durable. Not flimsy at all. It remains quiet when getting on the bed too. If you need a cheap alternative to a box spring, look no futher.
customer_reviews.author: RyzenArchitecture7

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had it for 3 months and it bent and is falling apart Update Now broken in half and destroyed my flooring
customer_reviews.author: Ym

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and very sturdy and no squeaking. Lost one star because one of the metal parts was warped a bit. Luckily my son knew how to fix it so I didn't have to return. Also, just be warned that not all totes fit underneath the bed. If you have a bunch of totes already you're looking to store, make sure you measure them first. My clear plastic ones fit great, but my bigger heavy duty ones do not. My fault for not measuring first though, but just thought I'd warn people because I wish I had thought to do that! But when it boils down to it, I still would have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's 14", and allows for storage underneath if desired. Sturdy, and functional, and perfect for my memory foam mattress. My cats won't be able to scratch up this bed frame like they did my pleather one, so that's definitely one reason I purchased this. The cost was appropriate and I see this frame as a great value!! My bed sits high now, and I like that🖒.
customer_reviews.author: Dana A.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up!
customer_reviews.text: Crap! I purchased this for my daughter and had it less then a year and it is already dipping and broken in 2 places! She is 120 lbs. Pay the extra 20 to get a heavy duty so this doesn't happen to you.
customer_reviews.author: SHanke

customer_reviews.title: no box spring needed
customer_reviews.text: i love this frame,at first i thought its to high,but actually its not. it feels good to sit on it and or get off of it , It also has made my pillow top mattress firmer than when it was on my box springs. my cat really enjoys it as much as me too. now my daughter wants one but for a double or queen.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Just... eh!
customer_reviews.text: The frame was bent and I had to fix it for it to work, had some major blemish also on the frame. I’m using it and it does what it’s supoosed to do but for the money I expect better than this
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blake

customer_reviews.title: The best thing to do is to avoid a box spring ...
customer_reviews.text: This is about the 5th one I have purchased... not sure they were all the same brand, but exactly same style. I learned through buying many mattresses (I own rental condo's), that it's not the mattress that craps out, it's the boxspring. The best thing to do is to avoid a box spring all together and get this bed frame... solves all problems and has great storage underneath. Be sure to order brackets separately if you intent to attach a head aboard of footboard.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Buy one more durable.
customer_reviews.text: I know it wasn't a lot of money but my 102 pound child is bending the pieces that go across. She is 5 feet 5 inches and very thin and this frame is not going to hold up and it squeaks every time she moves. Probabably will only get a few months out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Sinder

customer_reviews.title: I am really disappointed. The instructions were easy to understand and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a new frame and immediately found that two metal nubs that click one of the "B" bars in place were completely missing from my order. I am concerned this will affect the integrity and support of my sleeping experience. In addition, two of the smaller metal wires that runs across was not even attached to the frame; they are freely able to move. I am really disappointed. The instructions were easy to understand and I did like the labeling of every part.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 starts simply because a part was missing. Pros Easy assembly. Bought this for my 10 year old step son but it can hold a grown man's weight. Seems to be durable. After testing it out no bars have bowed or broken. I use this without a box spring. I'm assuming you could use a box spring but I wouldn't recommend it as your bed would be to high. Cons None besides the missing rod. However amazon compensated me for it and the frame still holds without it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back. Missing half the peices, no instructions and no hardware. Replaced with Amazon Basics, much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Frame works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This frame was super easy to put together, I noticed a few tiny (not necessary needed) parts were missing but the frame still goes perfectly together and is very stable. I like how high it is as well, I put a bed skirt on it (which my cats love to attack me from under) and store a couple tubs under the bed. Would buy again, better price than the other frames on amazon. I put my 12 inch memory foam bed on here, fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It got bent while I screwed bolts in, the frame is not very strong. Too many bolts to set up. There is a better deal with the exact same design with easier set up and stronger material at a just few more dollors.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, solid, worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this for a few days but it is very solid! It will probably be solid until the end of time. Two grown people sleep on it and it hasn’t moved or squeaked or gave me any concerns at all! My 15 year old put it together by herself, while I was busy painting kitchen cabinets, and she didn’t ask for my assistance once. I think she actually enjoyed it.. I didn’t find it anywhere else for a better price. Love shopping on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Mommy❤️

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the queen size bed frame and it arrived quickly with no damage to the packaging. I put off the assembly for a couple of days thinking it was going to be a bit time consuming. I tackled this alone and had it completely done within about 15 minutes. It was so easy to put together and I'm so pleased with the product!! Easy to assemble, clear directions and great design. Quality product and service. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenngypsy

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly and Sturdy, a Few Cheap Parts
customer_reviews.text: Got this when I realized my queen size box spring wasn't going to fit through my apartment door. Came in a flat square box that weighed around 37 pounds. Everything you need is included, including the frame itself, instructions, screws, and the screwdriver. It even came with spare screws! Instructions were very clear and I was able to put it together within an hour. There was two tiny parts that were cheaply made, but they will not affect the sturdiness of the frame. I would recommend having at leas one other person helping (don't need to but it'll make it easier to move). I got the queen size and it fits my queen size mattress perfectly. Definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, but a lot of components
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered an 8" memory foam/spring mattress to go with this. I am over 250 lbs, and can feel the bars ("lumps") coming thru the mattress. However, this is a very sturdy frame, fairly easy to put together, and sits right. I'd just suggest a thicker mattress, or maybe placing a board between mattress and frame. As sturdy as it is, I do feel that if you use this frame daily, it will eventually develop "squeaks" as there are a lot of screws and moving components that connect together. That is just an assumption as mine does not squeak, but we bought it specifically as a guest bed that will be used maybe once a month... All-in-all good frame!
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: This works great,super easy to put together once you look at the directions,glad I brought this ,just was upset when I seen it two days later for a lower price on a daily deal ,frustrating because I waited months before finalizing my order cause I wanted price to drop lol I'm definitely a Bargain shopper,but still satisfied with my order I got a full size frame fits perfectly, I also like the fact if I wanted to I could use it for my daughter's later as 2 twin frames for there mattress..
customer_reviews.author: Jescaza

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are a quick & easy bed frame to use but tbh they are not very sturdy at all. If my 145lb self sits on the bed to hard or if it’s that time of the night they clips that hold the legs out detach from the frame 😐 which is very annoying. If you’re using these for a kids bed or a guest bed they will be perfect but every day use for an adult is honestly not the best. We have purchased two of these & the second one broke a few months after having it and we literally just sat on the bed & it broke. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend and buy again
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was skeptical about buying this. My partner is 400 lbs and I’m 1/2 that, we have had this bed frame for about a year now. It has survived a cross country move and most importantly it has survived us.
customer_reviews.author: Laddy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This item came as quickly as expected. I was surprised at how sturdy the frame seems compared to frames we have purchased years before from another company. There are more parts than expected, but it is very easy to put together. The only issue I have is that for some reason the parts were all loose in the box, you could see the zip ties that held them all together for packaging were cut. There were no issues with the item, however. Happy with our purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: zach deitrick

customer_reviews.title: Bad placement of the middle legs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 2 year old daughters full size bed. It was easy to put together but seems a little frail. It also has horrible placement of one of the legs so every time I go to tuck my daughter in, I ended up kicking the leg so I put a foam condensation pipe around it which has saved my toes. It also doesn’t have a lip around the perimeter to keep the mattress from sliding off. The height is great for storage though.
customer_reviews.author: ACP

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up - Strong
customer_reviews.text: Holds a 10" Zinus memory foam mattress perfectly, I'm 6'6" and 245 lbs and this is rated at 500 lbs. Simple instructions and assembly, everything needed (plus spare hardware "just in case"), rock solid. No squeaks or flexing, good finish. Added a Modway headboard (you'll need a quick trip to the hardware store for some pipe-strap or EMT clamps to secure the headboard rails to the frame) and it's good to go. Really like the space underneath for storage boxes. Voilla - full size (very comfortable) bed for under $300 all told.
customer_reviews.author: Steeley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, used with 6 inch foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: I used this bed frame for a guest bedroom with a 6 inch foam mattress. Really easy to put together. I was a bit worried that the support bars would be felt under the mattress being that it’s so thin. Well, I was wrong. Even though it’s a low bed, it’s extremely comfortable. Any guests I’ve had say they had a great sleep. I haven’t slept on it myself but I have laid on it and it feels great. I definitely recommend for a guest bedroom. We may get a box spring to add height to the bed but it’s absolutely not necessary. I’m super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn Lee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, LOVE this bed frame! It was super easy to put together, and when I put my mattress and box spring on top of it, I felt like I was on top of the world because it is high up. After sleeping on a mattress and box spring on the floor for over 10 years, I am happy to be back on a bedframe that I love!
customer_reviews.author: Mipets

customer_reviews.title: Good but lighter than others we have.
customer_reviews.text: I am a 70 year old woman and put this together in about 15 - 20 minutes. We have two other bed frames like this one and they are both heavier duty than this one. That being said, this one is sturdy enough and solid when we use it. Would give 5 stars if it was not bolted together. Our others just unfolded out of the carton with no wrench needed. Welded is better, but this one is strong and solid so far. Price mattered on this purchase and it is excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GMom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It’s my first order in Amazon and I am pretty satisfied with it. The order was placed the day before yesterday and I got the package this afternoon so the shipment speed is fast. With the pack comes the Allen key as the assembling tool and it doesn’t need the extra tool like screw driver, which I prepared in advance. It takes me about twenty minutes to assemble it completely. It can easily hold my weight, which is about 68 kg. Therefore, I think it’s a satisfactory order.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaotao

customer_reviews.title: definitely squeeky
customer_reviews.text: We moved to a new house and in the process of that became broke, so I purchase this for a quick fix, it is a year later and I am finally going to purchase a real bed frame. This did not hold up well at all, we've had to tighten pieces often, some pieces seem to be just broken. It MAKES SO MUCH NOISE that moving off the bed when my baby is on it is a give away. Even just turning in my sleep it makes noise, I hate this frame.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Decent product!
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what it is, but, one issue. The support rods are lightly welded to the frame. This allows them to break the weld quite easily. Combine this with the thin cardboard carton used for shipping and you get a frame that can be used, but with a few support rods loose. Too much of a hassle to return, but doesn't seem to have a problem in use at the moment. Then again, we've only had it a couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Missing holes and incomplete directions
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to install, but was missing screwholes in two spots. The frame ended up being two identical twin frames which then have holes to attach them. The directions had no instructions on attaching them. I used some of the extra screws and some black spacer pieces that came with it to attach the two separate frames and so far it seems to be holding up. The frame seems sturdy and quiet, despite the two holes not being drilled and my guesswork on how the two frames were supposed to attach. Also the instructions provided came on partially crumpled, dirty paper, it seemed like someone had been walking on the instructions in sandy boots.
customer_reviews.author: erika hauser

customer_reviews.title: Ease
customer_reviews.text: Actually a great and positive surprise. Goes together easily with simple, clear instructions and diagrams with simple bolts and 1 Allen Wrench and nuts. The best surprise of all was that all the matching holes between parts were exact fits - no sloppy drill holes. I'm in my mid 70's and it took me about 45 minutes to put it together. Nicely they put a few spare parts in it just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy for a teenager!
customer_reviews.text: My son paid for this to get in his room. It's PERFECT! He has plenty of room to organize things under his bed, and a great frame for his new mattress. I laid on it for a minute, and it was very comfy! My husband and I plan to get a King size to replace our old/outdated and LOUD box spring.
customer_reviews.author: MyersWoman

customer_reviews.title: IT SQUEAKS after 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be a heavy duty but now, it creaks like crazy. I bought it because I like the description and it was a 2 frame twin xl for our king size bed. I was happy at first but now I am sad. I am not sure if I am supposed to tighten up the screws or it not as heavy duty as they said. My hubby is 285 lbs and I am 200 lbs and each of us have different frames and it is totally annoying when you here him or myself get off the bed. I won’t buy this again
customer_reviews.author: IRISH-PINAY 10

customer_reviews.title: This bed frame is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I Love my bed frame. It works so well and I can get storage totes under it comfortably because I am in a small area and need to maximize space. It is extremely sturdy. I would recommend getting maybe a yoga mat to go on the frame prior to putting the mattress on there. It slides a little, but not much. Overall, I highly recommend this amazing frame.
customer_reviews.author: Dawgelene

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed...UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: So...we have had this bed frame for a little over a month and the legs in the middle of the frame have buckled. So much so that they broke off after trying to bend it back into place. My ten year old son was using this frame. Let's just say he's on the couch until we get another one. I was hoping it would work out seeing how I have bought less expensive frames that have stood the test of time. This one, unfortunately, does not.
customer_reviews.author: TheGlossBoss

customer_reviews.title: Not For Use With Box Springs
customer_reviews.text: It was difficult to put together but it seems solid. I didn't realize that it CAN'T BE USED WITH BOX SPRINGS. I thought it would just be a high bed, which would have been ok, but it's not even possible to get into the bed if you use the box springs. So this is only if you are using a mattress alone
customer_reviews.author: jrmarsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so I could get rid of my old wooden platform. I like the fact that it was SO EASY to put together and very easy to move around the room. Although one of the ends was slightly bed at the end of the bed it wasnt that big of a deal as my new memory foam mattress sits on it perfectly. I now have extra space for storage underneath the bed. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Platform Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: The bed frame was just as described . I think a good value for the money. The small parts packaging need to be improved. I found it broken apart inside the main box which also could use some beefing up. The corner of the package where showing cracks from the travel and the small parts nuts and bolts were falling out. I found a missing wing nut beside front door where package was left. The would be my main complaint. The bed frame itself is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Larry K. Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up, good value
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bed frame for a little over a month and it's definitely delivered. It was easy to set up, no squeaking so far, and keeps my mattress in place. It's just a solid, basic frame. My only complaint is that the frame is so light it tends to move around the hardwood floor easily - I'm constantly pushing it back to where it belongs.
customer_reviews.author: Adis

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered, auto replacement and not as good!
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that what I reordered is not what came. I don’t understand why there is simply not a message that states the original product is not available so if you choose to proceed, it will be something else. While this one worked, it is not what I ordered so I’m disappointed. The information states no tools needed, however, it is because they supply the Allen wrench required and it took me about 30-45 minutes to assemble it but I was multitasking so it may have taken a shorter time if I had only focused on one thing.
customer_reviews.author: SMcrnmomx3

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: There are many pieces to put together many bolts. I had bought one before from another company no tools required and all you had to do is lift up the legs and snapping into place and I thought this was the same. Would not purchase it again very disappointed in the storage not that great sits too low, you can't even put a plastic bin underneath it a regular sized one
customer_reviews.author: Tweety

customer_reviews.title: High value for low cost!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a guest bed. It was very easy to put together -- I did it myself in about 30 minutes, and I'm not "handy" at all. My guest said it was sturdy, no squeaking or anything. Screws and an Allen key are included in the package, and the IKEA-style instructions are fairly easy to follow (read through them all before starting!). Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was fairly easy to put together, I did it myself so it took some time but wasn’t difficult. Seems to be holding up so far and feels pretty sturdy. I also like the height, I have a smaller room so it was nice to be able to push boxes under the bed for more floor space. My sister has a bed similar to this which is why I ordered this one, and I’m glad I did. Mattress doesn’t seem to be sliding but that could be because I have it pushed in a corner. Overall, if I needed another frame I’d buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Simple frame, easy setup, just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect platform frame, easy to put together and comes with the Allan wrench needed to assemble it. I bought two and was able to build them myself in little time. The feet on the sides in the middle of each side don’t reach the floor. It doesn’t squeak when sat on and is tall enough to store crates or baskets underneath.
customer_reviews.author: KATY

customer_reviews.title: highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This full size bed frame was so very easy to assemble ; parts a,b,c,d clearly marked and all the screws etc were packed together nicely - even included an extra screw and wing nut . The instruction sheet pictures were great and easy to follow. The quality seems excellent - the welds are solid and the paint is stellar and it is sturdy. I am an old retired lady and I had it set up and ready in about 40 minutes. The hard part was squatting on the floor and having to get back up...LOL
customer_reviews.author: nancilee

customer_reviews.title: Had one (fixable) defect
customer_reviews.text: The parts were very clearly labeled and instructions were clear, so overall it was good. There was one assembly defect: the legs rely on spring-loaded pins as part of their assembly. Two of the pins had not been inserted properly: one was at 45 degrees and one was completely sideways inside the tube. That was pretty hard to fix: I had to pull off the rubber foot and use a long rod to push them out the other side, then reinstall them myself.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Cheap little frame.. feels like It's sagging in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this from the comfort of my home. It arrived and I put it together and I've been using it for a little over a month now. Originally it was not making any noise. However, a month later, every movement creates a squeaky noise from under the bed. The bed was setup with the directions provided and all the parts were used. Not sure if it needs something else to silence the squeak. Or just better quality parts Update: bed frame did not last. Kept making noises and feels like its sagging because I wake up with severe lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together and very spacey under the bed too!
customer_reviews.text: It's great. It was easy to put together. It was quick to put together. Its sturdy and there's plenty of room under it as well. Now my cats like to play under the bed. I put a bed skirt on the bed and they just love that even more. I just have to get used to the middle legs because I sometimes forget they are there and end up kicking them because I have a tiny bedroom and have to squeeze around the bed to get from one side of the room to the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Schlickeiser

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was stronger
customer_reviews.text: Did not last as long as I hoped. It’s already in my dump run pile. This was for my son who is 200 lbs and he was able to break it in 3 different spots by plopping down on his bed. If your not 200 or more lbs and you don’t plop down on your bed I recommend this bed frame for you.
customer_reviews.author: Lolita

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I honestly hate it. When it arrived it came damaged. I don’t know if I received a used bed, but that’s what it looks like. Some rails were damaged and I couldn’t build it until I forced the parts together. It’s extremely noisy and the mattress slides down and to the sides. I wished I’ve made a better investment, it’s not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Prado

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and it is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Used for 3 months by a young teen and the wire is sagging and today the middle legs bent sideways making it garbage. You do have to assemble it which is a pain. There are other frames that do not require assembly and are much sturdier. I have one we have used for 7 years and it is great but the one I just bought is junk.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Turns to garbage in a month
customer_reviews.text: Update. Its been a month and it squeaks like crazy. Nothing stays tight regardless of how well you assemble it. Complete disappointment and shocking considering how much I initially liked it. Don't waste the money. Buy Zinus Love this frame, stronger looking metal than the Zinus one I had bought last year. The middle feet are not recessed so you do kick it lol. It does NOT fold down so, which isn't really needed. Has headboard/footboard mounts.
customer_reviews.author: DiizziiB84

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to it's price
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this frame did not last long. Not sure how it happened, but the middle leg bent on this with regular use by an 11 year old. My husband was able to bend it back but he isn't sure how long it will last. So on to a different bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Price nor time.
customer_reviews.text: Super work to put together. Think i counted 56 or more pieces to assemble.Definitely not worth buying. Hours of work if you do .I sent back and got something different. This is why its so cheaply priced also.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Ann Kern

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was pre-assembled but....
customer_reviews.text: it wasn't. My son had bought one previously (must have been a different brand). He popped his out of the box and it was totally assembled already. Took my son and I about 30 minutes to get it all put together. Fits my king-sized memory foam mattress perfectly and now I have underbed storage. I have heard a creak or two but nothing alarming. Suits my purpose and my budget.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and quite solid
customer_reviews.text: Had my 18 year old son assemble the frame"teachable moment". Helped with finishing touches but quite easy to assemble and could not be any happier with product. Sturdy, can say that because the boy is sturdy, lol no sounds when using the product. All in all was an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: 2Seekthetruth

customer_reviews.title: assembly
customer_reviews.text: It was very difficult and time consuming to put together. The frame was also bent during shipment. There was a bow in the steel frame. I did not return it due to the hassle and also disposing of the box before I put it together, but it took alot of assembly and there were too many screws. I thought it would be easy to unfold and screw a couple of pieces but this required more assembly than I realized. It works, but average quality.
customer_reviews.author: SusannaV

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This frame would work for anyone, it doesn't look great but it is functional and is super easy to put together. It would be nice if it folded up for easy moving but, all in all it was easy to assemble and gets my bed off of the floor so there is nothing to heartbreaking here. If I was in the market for another bed frame that didn't require a box spring I would for sure look into this frame again
customer_reviews.author: Rem

customer_reviews.title: A big “let down”
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be happy with this frame but it proved to be disappointing After the first few months of use, screws bent and came loose and the “supportive” bars bent. The bed made awful squeaking noises when my son moved around at night. Finally, decided to purchase another one and hope for a quiet and supportive nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: bucgirl97

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This frame was inexpensive to purchase but but exactly what I needed. It was easy to assemble. The 14" clearance underneath the frame allowed for extra storage. It also allowed me to remove the innerspring. The one drawback was that there was no containment rail to keep the mattress from slipping sideways. This was not an issue for me but might be an issue for a more active teenager or adult. Overall a good, cheap alternative for a raised bed frame.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well made and exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small apartment and the added storage space was great. There's one problem, not related to the frame, that I think the frame manufacturers could help with. Foam mattresses are quite a bit lighter than conventional mattresses and they tend to wander a bit off the surface of the frame. It would be nice if the frame makers would manufacture a short set of railings to clamp or screw into the sides and ends to force the mattress to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should be a 5 Star but...
customer_reviews.text: Great frame! But I got the box and the package that all the screws were in was busted open the screws were all threw out the box! UPS wasn’t careful with the box either so the box had holes in it... We all know where this is going.. had to go buy bolts for the frame to make it work... otherwise great frame! Thank god I found some black bolts the same size!
customer_reviews.author: Deven Bigley

customer_reviews.title: Not what it seems, but works well
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a folding bed frame for my foam mattress. This one showed up under the category of "folding mattress frames". It was a good price so I got it. IT DOES NOT FOLD! It works well and does the job, but be careful what you look for on Amazon, as your searchs can result in everything under the sun popping up, as well as everything you AREN'T looking for.
customer_reviews.author: chaidragonfire

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased so a long term guest's air mattress wouldn't be on the floor for a month. Easy to assemble. Ample space underneath to tuck luggage, shows, etc. Will also put to use to help space plan for a kids a bedroom since it's made up of roughly two twin sized frames. Will see if we can fit each half into a canvas laundry bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Applesauce

customer_reviews.title: This is very upsetting !  OMG now I have to deal with this again
customer_reviews.text: Really bad quality ! I usually go with the amazons choice but in this case it was a really bad choice, Now I have to send it back and buy a new one again ! I dont know how I am going to put all the pieces together and ship it back ! SO annoying they would sell something like this! It is supposed to be new and some parts are already broken ! AMAZON please do not recommend people things like this ! It is very annoying to send it back and look for a new one and put together a new one ! Jesus
customer_reviews.author: fabian correa

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was a pain in the ass setting it up because every other piece where you pop in the legs was defective. I took pliers and opened it until they fit. Honestly I don't think this is going to last very long, it doesn't seem like it can carry too much weight. If it makes it past 6 months I'll be very impressed. I didn't return it because I really need so we'll see...
customer_reviews.author: Blanco Castro

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was very easy. Everything needed to put it together was right there in the box. Simple instructions. My only concern is the frame seems.... delicate. I feel like the frame can easily be bent or warped. However, nothing bad has happened yet, and it is nice and quiet, so I'm very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: audiopr0

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT AND LOSE
customer_reviews.text: This is one the worst whatever they cal it I ever wasted money on. I have had it for 7 days and I am about to trash it away t avoid accidents as all the wires f=keep falling off each night. It is just a trap for anyone who buys it.
customer_reviews.author: A_Z777

customer_reviews.title: Great product and quality at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I purchased for my sons first big boy bed when I moved him out of his toddler bed. Super easy to assemble. Has a ton more storage than a normal height bed frame for a box bed and you dont need a box mattress with this. I am super pleased... So much so I bought myself a new mattress and same frame in a queen. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if i misunderstood, This was supposedly an EXTRA sturdy bedframe. However six months into using it i rolled onto my elbow one morning while on the edge and the metal strut bent, therefore causing a permanent dip in the frame. When I unpacked it i was suspect by the flimsy feel of the metal, but i was so excited because we've gone through boxsprings and this was supposed to be better. I'll keep using it until i find or build a truly stable platform for a bed!
customer_reviews.author: DCCP

customer_reviews.title: Strudy Inexpensive Bed Frame
customer_reviews.text: It was simple to put together, though it is nice if you have an extra set of hands. With the headboard brackets, my headboard is stable. And the frame doesn’t move or make any noise. I have it on carpeted floors. I don’t weigh that much (130 lbs) but I have had 200 lbs+ sleep with me on it and had no issues. I also like the height of it - it is higher than my old frame and I can store stuff easily underneath my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Cami L. Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with my queen box spring as I had to split it to fit it into my 2nd fl bedroom. I have to admit I was unsure due to the reviews but .......not only is this easy to set up but I feel like I have a new mattress ! The storage is awesome. One item you will need to add a foam pad (like the pads you buy for floating in the pool also called noodles) to put around the middle legs as you will find yourself stubbing your toe.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: a hunk of rust
customer_reviews.text: this thing was so incredibly cheap and dangerous, I cannot recommend. amazon refused to refund since I couldn't take it apart and send it back. stay far away from this product
customer_reviews.author: pinkfuzzysweater

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy...easy assemble by 62 y.o grand mother
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy enough.... mattress rather hard... I have put two expensive mattresses toppers to help make it a little more sleep friendly and it works.... not like a spa type mattress or downy but it’s still doing great but after I added the mattress covers.... Beware!!! You can spend more or a great mattress and box spring if you’re not on a budget.... or buy this item and add your own nice mattress covers(the 600 count mattress threads however)!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian & Husband

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Item was in good condition when received, and all equipment needed for assembly were present in the package, with a few extra nails and stuff. Came with a clear instruction manual with images to understand how to assemble the bed frame. All parts of the frame were neatly arranged and efficiently packed, and the bed was up and ready in no time. I've been using the bed for around two weeks now, and there's no complaints from me regarding it. Being a student living on an apartment and a tight budget, this platform bed was the ideal equipment for me. And it was totally worth it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Yasith Jayawardana

customer_reviews.title: Strong but lightweight and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a foundation for a green size mattress. It’s very lightweight but solid and easy to assemble. The only thing I didn’t account for was the height. It is 14 inches high and you can store things under it. However, I needed a box spring and a mattress to get the height I’m used to having.
customer_reviews.author: Stick

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Zinnius brand instead.
customer_reviews.text: Have 5 of these bedframes from Zinnius. Needed to buy a twin size for a vacation home, but the Zinnius was sold out. Decided to try Simple Houseware version and it’s not the same. You have to assemble the whole frame whereas the Zinnius version makes you install only 4 wingnuts and that’s it. Love the storage under these bed frames, but overall the quality and ease of set up isn’t the same with this brand of wonder base. Back to Zinnius for me!
customer_reviews.author: JVillane

customer_reviews.title: No hardware, no instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Seems like its worth the money. No tools required for me; because it came with NO hardware. It also came without instruction. Would have been nice to use right out of the box, had it came with bolts to fasten.
customer_reviews.author: J.Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble - sturdy frame - lots of storage gained.
customer_reviews.author: Team Hapsmo

customer_reviews.title: The person sat it out to the street to be picked up by the garbage man and I was just out of $70
customer_reviews.text: I sent this frame to someone as a gift, it was damaged and broken when it arrived. The person sat it out to the street to be picked up by the garbage man and I was just out of $70.00
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Some parts missing
customer_reviews.text: It was ok the reason I purchased it was to get a lower bed the 18” I bought was too high, this bed here was missing a part but was able to make it work. I wasn’t as impressed with this bed as I was with the one I purchased from Walmart that i had to return. This bed is made in China and i didn’t know it but the other was made in Vietnam and just folded together no putting it together with screws and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Seudy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame with good storage room underneath
customer_reviews.text: I use this frame to support a foam mattress, one of those beds that get delivered to your door in a box. It has worked very well for me. The materials are not particularly heavy duty, but the bracing design is good and creates a solid base. No squeaking or funny noises coming from it after 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: After 2 years me and my fat kids...
customer_reviews.text: Me sleeping here and these damn kids jumping on the bed (THEY ARE LIKE 11,14 sometimes toddler cousins come and jump!) Yea annoying, I know. And only one screw came off from the middle and its bent but its only cause of the screw but I can pull it back to normal until the screw comes? I purchased the warranty thank goodness!! And waiting to see what they will send me! A new frame or a few screws? Overall I like the platform bed to store bins and unnecessary crap that I keep hidden for hopefully forever!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Zeno

customer_reviews.title: Let’s give this it a try
customer_reviews.text: Bought and received product a few months ago, just put it together today. Assembly was fairly easy. Put a lisa saperia (I misspelled on purpose) mattress on it that I purchased last year. The frame after assembly felt very sturdy and like that fact I will be able to store stuff underneath. Will give this 5 stars for now, but will update once I sleep on it a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: RickyAl

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good quality
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my college students dorm room. He wanted a more comfortable bed. This frame was light weight and very easy to install. I purchased a inexpensive mattress to go on top and he loves it!! (Anything is better than the dorm mattresses). But this will be easy to take down and folds nicely for storage once School is over. I am forever a fan of smart box bed frame. So much storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure about this
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was would fold in half once assembled but it doesn't. It took a bit of time to assemble bit still pretty simple. I do question how long this frame will last as it doesn't see very well made or sturdy. The one from Zinus is much better and its also the same price.
customer_reviews.author: -Lisa9205

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Update! Not even a year since purchase and this is how the frame looks! Rip off! Cheaply made!! Not even a year and both of my kids twin frames are literally cracking and bending in half! My youngest son is only 10 and it’s bending on him. The smaller wires are poking up. The middle is dipping! I am so disappointed. I “thought” these were great purchases and was so happy to receive them. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Perez

customer_reviews.title: What box spring?
customer_reviews.text: This frame is FANTASTIC - there is no need to have a box spring (if you know what I am talking about) you just put the frame together and put the mattress right on top. It's sturdy and way simple to assemble and gives you enough clearness to store things under it. THIS IS A MUST BUY IF YOU NEED A FRAME.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sending kids to college
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different product last year for my other daughter...and they say you always learn with the 1st kid, get it better with the 2nd...We learned that this product is higher off the ground allowing for more storage underneath of a college kids stuff in a rented apartment with 6 other students Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy

customer_reviews.title: Note! This Product Requires Assembly!
customer_reviews.text: This does not simply fold up. It requires 1/2 hour of assembly. Be careful to orient legs with base so the detent balls "snap" into detents correctly. Very good structurally. 10 inch mattress was supported very well. I would recommend this to my friends...
customer_reviews.author: Dale V.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our daughter's room because her box springs kept squeaking. Now no need for box springs! Lightweight and easy to move around if needed. My daughter and I assembled it together and it wasn't difficult to do. Once assembled, we just plopped the mattress on top and ready to go. Love the storage space underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the a$$ to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Holy crap was it a pain to put together! The legs are oval shape but something happened in production that misshaped where the legs went into. Now I'm trying to put an oval into a half oval half rectangle! I literally sat there and banged on the legs until it resembled the hole I was trying to put it in. You get what you pay for with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy frame
customer_reviews.text: This frame is very easy to assemble. It’s sturdy and easy to move around a room if rearranging the room. Only issue is that if you just have the mattress on top it will slide. Not sure that really an issue with the frame. Anyways we put some rubber backed tape across some of the bars to keep the mattress from sliding around. Just a helpful Hint.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are so easy you can build alone or with a child helping!! In my case child who’s 10 assembled it with my just tightening the pieces that needed to be tightened. He did an amazing job! I changed it from 5 stars to 1 because it broke on a 10 year old the middle support broke after a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Evangeline Laguna

customer_reviews.title: They are what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I put for of these together in about an hour. That was with a few interruptions. I imagine it takes about 10 min to assemble. Anyhow, I’m using these for kids that way 60 lbs and less. I am triple the weight and I sat on all parts of the bed, laid down and it felt very sturdy on carpeted flooring. I don’t have a box spring. Exactly what I needed and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Simple Houseware 14-Inch Twin Size Mattress Foundation Platform Bed Frame, Twin
product_meta.description: Size:TwinSimple Houseware 14-Inch Twin Size Mattress Foundation Platform Bed Frame, Twin
feature_bullets: 14" height for more storage space. 13" storage space under the frame
Replace bed frame and box spring
No additional box spring is reauired. You can put your memory foam, spring, or latex mattress directly on it.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,645 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
